original_text: At that time, there were no people in Israel who could use iron to make things. The Philistines had said, ‘We must not let the Hebrew people make swords and spears.’
korean_text: 그 때에 이스라엘 온 땅에 철공이 없었으니 이는 블레셋 사람들이 말하기를 히브리 사람이 칼이나 창을 만들까 두렵다 하였음이라

sentences.original_text: there were no people in Israel
who could use iron to make things
sentences.korean_translation: 철을 사용하여 물건을 만들 수 있는

sentences.original_text: We must not let the Hebrew people
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 히브리 사람들을 허락해서는 안 된다
